DOC.brief_summary: Aim : determine optimal Ca2+ concentration 905 ppm F NaF . Study design : Experimental study 10 volunteer . Single blind mouth rinse calcium lactate solution ( 150 ; 75 ; 0 mM Ca-lactate ) immediately follow standard fluoride rinse . Procedure : Rinses perform even . The rinse combination give random order , subject unaware sequence . At least 3 day separate use rinse . Dosage : 20 mL 1 minute rinse solution . Saliva sample : Twelve hour rinse , unstimulated saliva sample collect expectoration . Analysis : The fluoride concentration saliva sample analyse Statistics data handling : Fluoride saliva 12 hour rinse examine one-way ANOVA , repeat measure design .
DOC.brief_title: Optimised Fluoride Prevention Double Rinse With Fluoride Calcium
DOC.criteria: 18 year old 10 natural teeth willing refrain use fluoride contain product sign informed consent le 10 natural teeth reduce cognitive skill speak and/or understand Swedish ongoing oral systemic infection pregnancy breast feeding
